 CrimeMoon_matrix <- as.matrix(TransformGainesville_Crimes_numeric[,c("CFS","CFS_Type","Classification", "offenseHour","offenseDOW","moonPhase")]) #convert data frame into numeric matrix
> CrimeMoon_matrix <- as.matrix(TransformGainesville_Crimes_numeric[,c("CFS","CFS_Type","Classification", "offenseHour","offenseDOW","offenseMonth","offenseYear","month", "year", "DOW", "moonPhase")]) #convert data frame into numeric matrix
> cor(CrimeMoon_matrix)
